description: Complete system overview covering the risk management platform architecture, tier system, and core assessment framework
Detailed documentation of risk calculation algorithms, including vendor categorization weights, assessment scoring formulas, and risk level thresholds
Comprehensive documentation of data models for vendors, assessments, assets, and their relationships, including tier-specific constraints
Technical documentation of the assessment templates, compliance frameworks (NIST, SOC2, GDPR, etc.), and scoring methodologies
Documentation of tier-based feature gates, usage tracking system, and subscription management logic
